main event: A civilian reported seeing 4 red lights in the sky over Staten Island, New York on September 29, 1968.
interesting points: The observer reported that the 4 red lights remained in the same position for about 15 minutes.
The lights were white in color with a bright light in the center.
When one of the lights would flicker, the others would flicker as well.
The observer could not make out the shape or size of the objects.
The objects finally disappeared from view one at a time.
